comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: Nobody can guarantee that Bitcoin won't eventually experience another major drop in the price. So, if someone invests now, it's possible that it is not the bottom, and investors will see temporary losses at some point. To help ensure that people are satisfied, it's important to understand that now is indeed a good time for investment, provided that a person believes in Bitcoin's eventual full recovery (which alone would bring more than 3x profits), likely further growth, and is also prepared and capable of hodling for what can be from several months to a few years.
